summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 70E, Page 168 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at the northeast corner of 5th Avenue Southwest and Southwest Kenyon Street from Single Family Residental 7200 (SF 7200) Zone to General Industrial (IG) Zone, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of John V. Farrell; C.F. 292489).
